description.lang: Z-Wave Plus gateway/controllerWorks with Amazon Echo(Alexa) and Google Home and is IFTTT compatible Controls up to 60 Z-Wave devicesSupports Z-Wave devices inclusion and control, room control and scene control via free iOS and Andoid View and Control App (SwiidCam+View)One mega-pixel camera, 1280x800, 30 fps with H.264 video compression340 degree pan and 90 degree tilt controlUp to 5 video view presetsDay and night with IR ledin-built light, sound and motion sensorsAllows alarm notification for each Z-Wave devices and each sceneTwo-way audioTime lapse video recordingSD card and Cloud storageSmart home iOS and Android App802.11 n wireless with WEP and WPA/WPA2 security support.WPS (WiFi Protected Setup) support
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline, report Device Reset Locally when reset.
